ModMetaData.name: Wormax
ModMetaData.author: archonwu
ModMetaData.description: First discovered in 1971 by Belgium pharmaceutical company "NotJanssen Pharmaceutical," this single-dose drug completely cures many varieties of intestinal parasite. Including GUT WORMS. It quickly made a place for itself among the World Health Organisation's list of essential medicines before the collapse of Earth made the WHO redundant.
